comments:
An NPE is thrown when a local application is profiled using the Java Application
launch configuration with IAC.  Note that profiling the same application using
an External launch configuration with IAC seems to work.

Tested on the TPTP-4.1.0-200511030100 driver.  My PATH is set to:
PATH=C:\j2sdk1.4.2_08\bin.  The IAC log file is attached.  The thrown exception
appears below:
